verses.verse: Blessed <S%H835><s%> is everyone who fears <S%H3373><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> who walks <S%H1980><s%> in his ways. <S%H1870><s%>
For you will eat <S%H398><s%> the labor <S%H3018><s%> of your hands. <S%H3709><s%> You will be happy, <S%H835><s%> and it will be well with you. <S%H2896><s%>

Your wife <S%H802><s%> will be as a fruitful <S%H6509><s%> vine, <S%H1612><s%> in the innermost parts <S%H3411><s%> of your house; <S%H1004><s%> your children <S%H1121><s%> like olive <S%H2132><s%> plants, <S%H8363><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> your table. <S%H7979><s%>
Behold, <S%H1397><s%> thus is the man blessed <S%H1288><s%> who fears <S%H3373><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

May Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> you out of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and may you see <S%H7200><s%> the good <S%H2898><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of your life. <S%H2416><s%>
Yes, <S%H7200><s%> may you see your children <S%H1121><s%>'s children. <S%H1121><s%> Peace <S%H7965><s%> be upon Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
